skills.name: Cannon
skills.description:
Charged Cannon.
1st Sequence: Single shot.
2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.
3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.
Wielder's QTE ATK gains 25.00% Physical DMG.

skills.name: Breath of Guren
skills.description: 60% chance to ignite target, dealing 150 DMG every 0.5s for 4.10s.
